creator: KoreaDigital
descriptionHtml:
Korea Digital develops new software, Science Sharp(Science#) which is collected and analyzed the data about the science experiment based on any Android devices.
Experience ScienceSharp for the future science class and smart education now which is simpler than ScienceCube and much stronger.

Main functions of Science#
- You can analyze the real-time collected data from the sensor easily and exactly by an internal analysis function.
- It can be expressed the various kinds of form by collected data such as a graph, number or table.

Strong the new function of Science#
- Science# is an App analysis program which can be installed into all of Android-based devices. You can download the app from Google Market directly and apply it for Science Experiment.
- Science# is no longer required the use of cable. We remove the tangled cable between the interface and sensors so that students can do more exciting experimental activities through wireless connection environment. The students can increase their concentration for the experiment and easily experience the science experiment both indoor and outdoor.
- There are four contents and manuals of Science: Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Earth Science. Through applied those, students can understand the concept and experimental analysis simultaneously.
- Based on a non-stop system environment, the users do experiment with the applied contents in Science#. The students can write the report based on what they get an experimental result directly. The students record the collected data through the experiment and they understand the concept through the report. There are intensive activities and questions for the conceptional extension. The Students transmit the report to a teacher so that the teacher can provide quick feedback evaluating the report immediately.
- By one-touch, you can set up the most appropriate experimental environment automatically for the data-collection.
- There is an additional function for the Physics that is an automatic calculation based on the various formulas. When you select the formula, it is automatically calculated and drawn the graph.
- Based on a non-stop system environment, the users do experiment with the applied contents in Science#. The students can write the report based on what they get an experimental result directly. The students record the collected data through the experiment and they understand the concept through the report. There are intensive activities and questions for the conceptional extension.
- The Students transmit the report to a teacher so that the teacher can provide quick feedback of the report immediately.

Korea Digital develops new software, Science Sharp(Science#) which is collected and analyzed the data about the science experiment based on any Android devices.
Experience ScienceSharp for the future science class and smart education now which is simpler than ScienceCube and much stronger.

Main functions of Science#
- You can analyze the real-time collected data from the sensor easily and exactly by an internal analysis function.
- It can be expressed the various kinds of form by collected data such as a graph, number or table.

Strong the new function of Science#
- Science# is an App analysis program which can be installed into all of Android-based devices. You can download the app from Google Market directly and apply it for Science Experiment.
- Science# is no longer required the use of cable. We remove the tangled cable between the interface and sensors so that students can do more exciting experimental activities through wireless connection environment. The students can increase their concentration for the experiment and easily experience the science experiment both indoor and outdoor.
- There are four contents and manuals of Science: Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Earth Science. Through applied those, students can understand the concept and experimental analysis simultaneously.
- Based on a non-stop system environment, the users do experiment with the applied contents in Science#. The students can write the report based on what they get an experimental result directly. The students record the collected data through the experiment and they understand the concept through the report. There are intensive activities and questions for the conceptional extension. The Students transmit the report to a teacher so that the teacher can provide quick feedback evaluating the report immediately.
- By one-touch, you can set up the most appropriate experimental environment automatically for the data-collection.
- There is an additional function for the Physics that is an automatic calculation based on the various formulas. When you select the formula, it is automatically calculated and drawn the graph.
- Based on a non-stop system environment, the users do experiment with the applied contents in Science#. The students can write the report based on what they get an experimental result directly. The students record the collected data through the experiment and they understand the concept through the report. There are intensive activities and questions for the conceptional extension.
- The Students transmit the report to a teacher so that the teacher can provide quick feedback of the report immediately.

Korea Digital develops new software, Science Sharp(Science#) which is collected and analyzed the data about the science experiment based on any Android devices.
Experience ScienceSharp for the future science class and smart education now which is simpler than ScienceCube and much stronger.

Main functions of Science#
- You can analyze the real-time collected data from the sensor easily and exactly by an internal analysis function.
- It can be expressed the various kinds of form by collected data such as a graph, number or table.

Strong the new function of Science#
- Science# is an App analysis program which can be installed into all of Android-based devices. You can download the app from Google Market directly and apply it for Science Experiment.
- Science# is no longer required the use of cable. We remove the tangled cable between the interface and sensors so that students can do more exciting experimental activities through wireless connection environment. The students can increase their concentration for the experiment and easily experience the science experiment both indoor and outdoor.
- There are four contents and manuals of Science: Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Earth Science. Through applied those, students can understand the concept and experimental analysis simultaneously.
- Based on a non-stop system environment, the users do experiment with the applied contents in Science#. The students can write the report based on what they get an experimental result directly. The students record the collected data through the experiment and they understand the concept through the report. There are intensive activities and questions for the conceptional extension. The Students transmit the report to a teacher so that the teacher can provide quick feedback evaluating the report immediately.
- By one-touch, you can set up the most appropriate experimental environment automatically for the data-collection.
- There is an additional function for the Physics that is an automatic calculation based on the various formulas. When you select the formula, it is automatically calculated and drawn the graph.
- Based on a non-stop system environment, the users do experiment with the applied contents in Science#. The students can write the report based on what they get an experimental result directly. The students record the collected data through the experiment and they understand the concept through the report. There are intensive activities and questions for the conceptional extension.
- The Students transmit the report to a teacher so that the teacher can provide quick feedback of the report immediately.
